faqWhatIsAladdinMilesAnswer: AladdinMiles is a super app that rewards you with air miles for shopping at your favourite venues and allows you to redeem these miles with your airlines. It also offers features like ordering food, booking flights, hotels, and rides.
faqHowDoesAppWorkAnswer: You can earn air miles by shopping at venues. These miles can be redeemed for travel bookings or to your airline membership card within the app.
faqHowFrequentlyUpdated: How frequently are new offers and rewards updated?
faqHowFrequentlyUpdatedAnswer: New offers and rewards are updated regularly, so be sure to check the app often to maximize your benefits.
faqHowToEarnMilesAnswer: Earn miles by shopping at your favorite venues on the AladdinMiles app.
faqHowToRedeemMiles: How can I redeem my miles?
faqHowToRedeemMilesAnswer: Redeem your miles with registered airlines or exchange them for travel bookings directly within the AladdinMiles app.
faqTrackingRewards: How do I track my rewards and cashback?
faqTrackingRewardsAnswer: The AladdinMiles app shows all your current rewards, cashback, and transaction history in real time.
faqWhatIsWallet: What wallet features does the app offer?
faqWhatIsWalletAnswer: The app includes a money wallet and a miles wallet, letting you add funds, convert money to miles, send miles, and receive cashback.
faqHowToAddMoney: How do I add money to my wallet?
faqHowToAddMoneyAnswer: Head to your wallet page and tap on the top-up button to add money to your money wallet.
faqHowToConvertMiles: How do I convert money to miles?
faqHowToConvertMilesAnswer: Transfer funds from your money wallet to your miles wallet - the conversion rate is clearly displayed during the process.
faqCanSendMiles: Can I send my miles to someone else?
faqCanSendMilesAnswer: Yes, you can easily transfer miles to friends or family using the app’s built-in transfer feature.
faqHowToAddFunds: How do I add funds to my wallet?
faqHowToAddFundsAnswer: Top up your wallet using your credit or debit cards.
faqServices: What services can I access through the app?
faqServicesAnswer: In addition to earning and redeeming miles, you can order food, shop at registered venues, and book flights, hotels, and rides - all in one place.
faqCanOrderFood: Can I order food or shop on the app?
faqCanOrderFoodAnswer: Yes, you can order food and shop from your favourite venues directly on the AladdinMiles app.
faqBookingServicesAnswer: Book flights, hotels, and rides using the AladdinMiles app.
faqInternationalServices: Can I use the app for international travel bookings?
faqInternationalServicesAnswer: Absolutely, you can book international flights and hotels through the AladdinMiles app.
faqFinancialSecurity: Is my personal and financial information secure?
faqFinancialSecurityAnswer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security protocols to keep your data safe.
faqTransactionReceipts: Can I access my receipt and transaction information on the app?
faqTransactionReceiptsAnswer: Yes, we store your transaction information and receipts which you can access at any time you want.
faqHelpOrSupport: How do I get help or support?
faqHelpOrSupportAnswer: Access our in-app support or visit the Help Center for any questions or assistance.
faqContactVenueOrder: How do I contact a venue about my order?
faqContactVenueOrderAnswer: You can contact a venue about your order by tapping on the message icon at the top of the order history page.
faqTechnicalIssues: What if I encounter issues with the app?
faqTechnicalIssuesAnswer: If you encounter any issues, try restarting the app or contacting support for assistance.
